title: The Writer's Almanac for Friday, January 21, 2022
description: “I just try, like any writer, to be entertaining and interesting. I want people to get some pleasure and to learn something.”--Louis Menand (1952), American Critic and essayist.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
